content.raw:
I see that labscript also does an 'import *'.

How are unit conversions used in practice, do experiment scripts use the unit conversion classes as imported from labscript, or do they import them explicitly from `labscript_utils.unitconversions`? If the former, then it will be difficult to modify labscript to not import * whilst being backward compatible with these scripts.
content.html:
I see that labscript also does an 'import *'.

How are unit conversions used in practice, do experiment scripts use the unit conversion classes as imported from labscript, or do they import them explicitly from labscript_utils.unitconversions? If the former, then it will be difficult to modify labscript to not import * whilst being backward compatible with these scripts.
